results.name: Beginning with the natural numbers, swap [ k*sqrt(5) ] and [ (k/4)*(5 + sqrt(5)) ], for all k >= 1.
comment: Self-inverse integer permutation induced by Beatty sequences for sqrt(5) and (5+sqrt(5))/4. - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jun 11 2005
